H1.text: where in the constitution is the executive branch referenced. The Preamble

H2.text: where in the constitution is the executive branch referenced. Article Three, Section 2

H3.text: where in the constitution is the executive branch referenced. Article Two

A4.text: Article Two of the United States Constitution establishes the executive branch of the federal government, which carries out and enforces federal laws.
